ch.uzh.agglorecommender.recommender

Class ClusterInteraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.recommender.ClusterInteraction

  • public class ClusterInteraction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a proxy for multiple ways of interaction with the tree resulting from the clustering

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private NodeBuilder builder 
      private Evaluator evaluator 
      private Inserter inserter

      private Searcher searcher 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClusterInteraction(Searcher searcher)
      The class needs to be instantiated with a reference to a searcher Class instance which acts as a connector to the leaf and root nodes of the tree and is needed by the integrated tools
